issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Document the desired SQL dialect for DataFusion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11165](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11165). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9108#issuecomment-755791235

We would like to pick a single SQL dialect in DataFusion to avoid what happened with Spark SQL where functions, https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/sql/index.html, were added seemingly ad-hoc making their usage very difficult and no clear feature matrix available.

Using an existing dialect will also allow us to re-use the documentation (and other tools) from that dialect.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11165?focusedCommentId=17262589) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9127
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9127>
